LinesAnswers.name: shahtarsAmok
LinesAnswers.line: (Baby cries) Boy, what do you need? Stop messing around here, you dirty punk! Better help a nice woman, my baby can't sleep because of those loud miners over there. They drink all the way and scream in a drunken rage! (Baby continues crying.)

LinesAnswers.name: shahtarsHigh
LinesAnswers.line: (Baby cries) Boy, what do you need? Stop messing around here, you dirty punk! Better help a nice woman, my baby can't sleep because of those loud miners over there. They drink all the way and scream in a drunken rage! (Baby continues crying.)

responses.response: The men fell asleep, apparently, the potion was strong.

LinesAnswers.name: meMomThankfull
LinesAnswers.line: Thank you, kid. Take the soap and these things too, wash your face, and you'll be beautiful in body and soul.

LinesAnswers.name: leaveMeMomAlone
LinesAnswers.line: SIMON: The child is silent, the mother does not mutter.
